Name: Hentai Monster Quiz 2
About the game: Beautiful representatives of various types of monsters are ready to get to know you better! You are waiting for 7 beautiful girls who have 7 different characters and lifestyles. Each of them is unique and inimitable! You definitely dreamed about it! They are ready to turn your mind around and show you all their charms! You have a test. You have to familiarize yourself with their biography and habits, as well as pass a blitz survey. After all, every girl wants attention. You need the most treasure. If you are confident in your knowledge and you are ready for a real adventure, then they are waiting for you! Become their hero and they will generously reward you! Features: 1. 7 beautiful ladies. Each of their unique personality. 2. More than 10 questions for each of the girls. 3. Each girl has more than 8 items of clothing. 4. Use your thinking and memory to win the quiz.
